required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Awareness of Systemic Diseases and Its Dental Implications
clinical_study.official_title: Awareness and Knowledge of Systemic Diseases and Its Relevance to Oral Health Care Among Dentists and Dental Interns: Observational Cross-sectional Study

brief_summary.textblock: Implications of systemic diseases on Oral health and their manifestation

detailed_description.textblock: Systemic Diseases have oral manifestations and these oral manifestation may affects the treatment plan and may affect the drugs given after dental treatment hence the study aims to assess the awareness and knowledge of systemic diseases and its implications in the dental field

primary_outcome.measure: degree of awareness among dentists and dental students about systemic diseases and its relevance to oral health.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess their knowledge about dental management of these cases

clinical_study.condition: Dental Awareness of the Relation Between Systemic Disease and Oral Health Conditions

arm_group.description: Dentists working for Egyptian ministry of health - Cairo

study_pop.textblock: Dental health care providers in different settings

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Dentists working for Egyptian ministry of health - Cairo.
- Dental interns of Cairo University.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Those who refused to share information.
- Candidates who refused to sign consent.

overall_official.affiliation: Post grad Student at Cairo University

results_reference.citation: Tavares M, Lindefjeld Calabi KA, San Martin L. Systemic diseases and oral health. Dent Clin North Am. 2014 Oct;58(4):797-814. doi: 10.1016/j.cden.2014.07.005. Epub 2014 Aug 7.
